hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh

Interface IndexedTriangleMesh

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PointList, TriangleMesh
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IndexedTriangleStrip
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractIndexedTriangleStrip, IndexedTriangleMeshImpl, IndexedTriangleStripImpl, TriangleSetImpl

    public interface IndexedTriangleMesh
extends TriangleMesh, PointList
    A triangle mesh which provides a list of points and triples of point indices.
    Author:
    Kaz√≥ Csaba

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int getTriangleCount()
      Returns the number of triangles in the mesh.
      Vector3 getTrianglePoint(int triangle, int point)
      Returns the the specified vertex.
      int getTrianglePointIndex(int triangle, int point)
      Returns the index of the specified vertex.

      • Methods inherited from interface hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh.TriangleMesh

        iterateTriangles

      • Methods inherited from interface hu.kazocsaba.v3d.mesh.PointList

        getPoint, getPointCount

    • Method Detail

      • getTriangleCount

        int getTriangleCount()
        Returns the number of triangles in the mesh.
        Returns:
        the number of triangles

      • getTrianglePointIndex

        int getTrianglePointIndex(int triangle,
                        int point)
        Returns the index of the specified vertex.
        Parameters:
        triangle - the index of the triangle to query
        point - the index of the vertex within the triangle
        Returns:
        the index of the specified vertex
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the triangle index is out of range or if point is not 0, 1, or 2

      • getTrianglePoint

        Vector3 getTrianglePoint(int triangle,
                       int point)
        Returns the the specified vertex.

        This method is equivalent to getPoint(getTrianglePointIndex(triangle, point)).

        Parameters:
        triangle - the index of the triangle to query
        point - the index of the vertex within the triangle
        Returns:
        the specified vertex
        Throws:
        IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the triangle index is out of range or if point is not 0, 1, or 2
